project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would consist of a four-year program (1970-73), for the continuation, improvement and expansion of maintenance operations on national roads. The program would be implemented with the assistance of consultants and would include the purchase of maintenance, shop and other equipment, the expansion and improvement of workshops and training of local personnel.
